Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Veterans, Lipps and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Veterans, Lipps, Lawrence and over regular route, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
